price: ߌ ߟߐ߬ߒ߬ߞߊ߲߬ߠߊ ߟߊߥߊ߲߬ߞߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߞߟߋ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߣߴߌ ߦߴߌ ߞߐߘߏ߲߬ ߛߏߡߊ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫
arabic: فَٱصۡدَعۡ بِمَا تُؤۡمَرُ وَأَعۡرِضۡ عَنِ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: fa-iṣ'daʿ bimā tu'maru wa-aʿriḍ ʿani al-mush'rikīna
